com.paydiant.android.ui.service.loyalty

Interface ILoyaltyManagementService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoyaltyManagementService

    public interface ILoyaltyManagementService
    This service class exposes the operations required to manage loyalty.
    Since:
    3.6.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Method Summary

        void retrieveLoyaltyGlobalProfileMetaData()

      • registerCustomerForLoyalty

        void registerCustomerForLoyalty(List<LoyaltyProfileData> loyaltyProfileDataList)
        Registers the customer for loyalty programs.
        Parameters:
        loyaltyProfileDataList - List of LoyaltyProfileData objects populated with values for the respective data types. E.g.: 
         loyaltyManagementService.retrieveLoyaltyGlobalProfileMetaData();
 
 @Override
 public void onRetrieveLoyaltyGlobalProfileMetaDataSuccess(List<LoyaltyProfileData> loyaltyProfileDataList) {
      // set the relevant data type values before registering.
      for (LoyaltyProfileData loyaltyProfileData : loyaltyProfileDataList) {
          loyaltyProfileData.setProfileDataValue(...);
      }
      this.loyaltyProfileDataList = loyaltyProfileDataList;
 }
 
 loyaltyManagementService.registerCustomerForLoyalty(loyaltyProfileDataList);
        See Also:
        LoyaltyProfileData, ILoyaltyManagerFacade.registerCustomerForLoyalty(List), ILoyaltyManagerService.registerCustomerForLoyalty(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.loyalty.CustomerProfileDataList)

      • recordExternalActivity

        void recordExternalActivity(ExternalActivity externalActivity)
        Records an external activity associated with the loyalty programs.
        Parameters:

        See Also:
        ILoyaltyManagerFacade.recordExternalActivity(ExternalActivity), ILoyaltyManagerService.recordExternalActivity(ExternalActivity)

      • setLoyaltyManagementListener

        void setLoyaltyManagementListener(ILoyaltyManagementListener listener)
        Sets the loyalty management listener. Parameter must be an implementation of ILoyaltyManagementListener. Most of the time, app developers only require to use a subset of the methods provided by this service, therefore use of LoyaltyManagementListenerAdapter, rather than an interface implementation is recommended.
        Parameters:
        listener - the new loyalty management listener
        See Also:
        LoyaltyManagementListenerAdapter, ILoyaltyManagementListener

      • removeListener

        void removeListener()
        Removes the loyalty management listener and sets it to null.
        Since:
        4.4.0.2
